model.driver

Class Grader

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.driver.Grader

  • public class Grader
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class for the program. Holds references to each roster.
    Author:
    Gavin Scott

      • addPercentageScore

        public static void addPercentageScore(Student student,
                                      java.lang.String asgn,
                                      double percent)
        Changes a student's score on an assignment in the currently selected roster as a percentage
        Parameters:
        student - The student whose score will be changed
        asgn - The name of the assignment that is being scored
        score - The student's new score as a percantage of the maximum score
